short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlocking the full features of Smart@Home LTE Wireless Router for model ZLT S10.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To enable the full functionality available in the console. This work for LTE Wireless Router Model ZLT S10 from Smart Axiata only. 
This will enable features such as:
- Network Lock Disable/Enable (Openline)
- Frequency Band Selection
- Cell ID Locking
- Network Selection (4G/3G/2G)
- USSD Dialer (Works on 3G Connection Only)
- APN Settings
- Internet / Data Limiter
- NAT Disable/Enable
- Firmware Upgrade
- Virtual Private Network
- Input Network Unlock Code

Change Log v1.0.3:
- Update Manifest v3
- Fix minor bug, function outdate from manifest v3
